name: Crumpet the Wizard
description:
I never made a game before but always wanted to give it a try so I decided to enter the Boundless Jame cause "it can't be that hard right".

It was.  This is not even a game.  I'm only bothering to upload it cause then I can at least say I did.  Crumpet is adorable at least so I got that going for me.

However it was still fun until I started pulling my hair out over my own spaghetti code.

I learned a lot (believe it or not).  This had a cool idea (mouse to aim and enemies spawn) so I am hoping to learn more and who knows, I'll maybe make something actually presentable for the next one!

Anyway, go vote on the other games in the Jam cause there looks like there are some bangers.

Also, I know this should just be a WebGL build but for some reason it never loads so I guess you get the ZIP of a game with one scene and no win or lose condition lol
